    Fitting and tuning Iteratively Fitted Models

    Predictions and residuals from a (multi-)model

    predict.model.Rd

    predict.model() and residuals.model() fit a model and extract the in-sample predictions and residuals, respectively.

    Usage

    # S3 method for model
predict(object, newdata = object$data, ...)

# S3 method for model
residuals(object, ...)

# S3 method for multimodel
predict(object, newdata, ...)

# S3 method for multimodel
residuals(object, ...)

    Arguments

    object

    A model or multimodel.

    newdata

    newdata

    ...

    Passed to fit.

    Value

    A vector if object is a “model”, a matrix if it is a “multimodel” or “cv” containing several models.

    See also

    fit, cv_predict (in particular examples), response.

    Examples

    mod <- model(lm(Sepal.Length ~ .,  iris), 
             label = "lm_iris")
predict(mod)
